titleStmt.title: The providences of God, observed through several ages, towards this nation, in introducing the true religion and then, in the defence of that, preserving the people in their rights and liberties, whilst other kingdoms are ravished of theirs, as our counsellors designed for us.
titleStmt.author: Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to S. Bethel. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
